verses.verse: You shall not <S%H5375>raise<s%> a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H8088>report<s%>: <S%H7896>put<s%> not your <S%H3027>hand<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to be an <S%H2555>unrighteous<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%>.

You shall not <S%H310>follow<s%> a <S%H7227>multitude<s%> to do <S%H7451>evil<s%>; neither shall you <S%H6030>speak<s%> in a <S%H7379>cause<s%> to <S%H5186>decline<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> to bend <S%H5186>judgment<s%>:
Neither shall you <S%H1921>favor<s%> a <S%H1800>poor<s%> man in his <S%H7379>cause<s%>.

If you <S%H6293>meet<s%> your <S%H341>enemy<s%>'s <S%H7794>ox<s%> or his <S%H2543>donkey<s%> going <S%H8582>astray<s%>, you shall <S%H7725>surely<s%> bring it <S%H7725>back<s%> to him <S%H7725>again<s%>.

If you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> of him that <S%H8130>hates<s%> you <S%H7257>lying<s%> under his <S%H4853>burden<s%>, and would not <S%H2308>want<s%> to <S%H5800>help<s%> <S%H5800>him<s%>, you shall surely help with <S%H5800>him<s%>.
You shall not <S%H5186>bend<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of your <S%H34>poor<s%> in his <S%H7379>cause<s%>.

Keep you <S%H7368>far<s%> from a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%>; and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> and <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H2026>kill<s%> you <S%H6663>not<s%>: for I will not justify the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> no <S%H7810>gift<s%>: for the <S%H7810>gift<s%> <S%H5786>blinds<s%> the <S%H6493>wise<s%>, and <S%H5557>perverts<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.

Also you shall not <S%H3905>oppress<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%>: for you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H5315>heart<s%> of a <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, <S%H3588>seeing<s%> you were <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H776>land<s%>, and shall <S%H622>gather<s%> in the fruits <S%H8393>there<s%>.

But the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> year you shall let it <S%H8058>rest<s%> and <S%H5203>lie<s%> <S%H34>still<s%>; that the poor of your <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%>: and what they <S%H3499>leave<s%> the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%>. In like manner you shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and with your <S%H2132>oliveyard<s%>.

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H4639>work<s%>, and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7673>rest<s%>: that your <S%H7794>ox<s%> and your <S%H2543>donkey<s%> may <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid<s%>, and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, may be <S%H5314>refreshed<s%>.

And in all things that I have <S%H559>said<s%> unto you be <S%H8104>circumspect<s%>: and make no <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, neither let it be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5921>out<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H7272>times<s%> you shall keep a <S%H2287>feast<s%> unto me in the <S%H8141>year<s%>.

You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>: you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you in the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%>; for in it you came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and none shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H7387>empty<s%>:)

And the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of your <S%H4639>labors<s%>, which you hast <S%H2232>sown<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H614>ingathering<s%>, which is in the <S%H3318>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>, when you hast <S%H622>gathered<s%> in your <S%H4639>labors<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.
<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> all your <S%H2138>males<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%>.

You shall not <S%H2076>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> with leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%>; neither shall the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of my <S%H2282>sacrifice<s%> <S%H3885>remain<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

The <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>. you shall not <S%H1310>boil<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H2461>milk<s%>.

<S%H7971>Behold<s%>, I send an <S%H4397>Angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H8104>keep<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and to <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4725>place<s%> which I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%>.

<S%H8104>Beware<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H8085>him<s%>, and obey his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, <S%H4843>provoke<s%> him <S%H5375>not<s%>; for he will not pardon your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>: for my <S%H8034>name<s%> is in <S%H7130>him<s%>.

But if you shall <S%H8085>indeed<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> all that I <S%H1696>speak<s%>; then I will be an <S%H340>enemy<s%> unto your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and an <S%H6887>adversary<s%> unto your <S%H6696>adversaries<s%>.

For my <S%H4397>Angel<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and <S%H935>bring<s%> you in unto the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>: and I will cut them <S%H3582>off<s%>.

You shall not bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to their <S%H430>gods<s%>, nor <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H6213>them<s%>, nor do after their <S%H4639>works<s%>: but you shall <S%H2040>utterly<s%> <S%H2040>overthrow<s%> <S%H7665>them<s%>, and quite break <S%H7665>down<s%> their <S%H4676>images<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and he shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and your <S%H4325>water<s%>; and I will <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H4245>sickness<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>you<s%>.
There shall nothing cast their <S%H7921>young<s%>, nor be <S%H6135>childless<s%>, in your <S%H776>land<s%>: the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H3117>days<s%> I will <S%H4390>fulfill<s%>.

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H367>fear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and will <S%H2000>destroy<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> to whom you shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> turn their backs unto <S%H6203>you<s%>.

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6880>hornets<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you which shall drive <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, from before <S%H6440>you<s%>.

I will not drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>; lest the <S%H776>land<s%> become <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, and the <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> multiply against <S%H7227>you<s%>.
By <S%H4592>little<s%> and <S%H4592>little<s%> I will drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you until you be <S%H6509>increased<s%>, and <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And I will <S%H7896>set<s%> your <S%H1366>bounds<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> even unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and from the <S%H4057>desert<s%> unto the <S%H5104>River<s%>: for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and you shall drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>.
You shall <S%H3772>make<s%> no <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H430>them<s%>, nor with their gods.

They shall not <S%H3427>live<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%>, lest they make you <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H5647>me<s%>: for if you serve their <S%H430>gods<s%>, it will surely be a snare unto <S%H4170>you<s%>.
